name: tm60
effect: Teaches Drain Punch to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Quash to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Drain Punch)

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: An energy-draining punch. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
flavor_text.platinum: An energy-draining punch. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: An energy-draining punch. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
